name: Strontium oxalate
desc: Strontium oxalate is a compound with the chemical formula SrC2O4. Strontium oxalate can exist either in a hydrated form (SrC2O4•nH2O) or as the acidic salt of strontium oxalate (SrC2O4•mH2C2O4•nH2O).
Main hazards: Skin and eye irritant. Inhaling the compound will irritate mucous membrane in the lungs.
